title: The DiversifyTheHouse Fundraising Initiative
selftext:
The #DiversifyTheHouse campaign is gaining traction!  I added a post to DailyKos and got some good response and donations for the 10 House Democrats that can transform the makeup of the House.

ActBlue link: 

[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/diversifythehouse](https://secure.actblue.com/donate/diversifythehouse)

Blog link: 

[https://turnwyomingblue.wordpress.com/2020/10/07/diversity-the-house-help-elect-these-10-democratic-candidates/](https://turnwyomingblue.wordpress.com/2020/10/07/diversity-the-house-help-elect-these-10-democratic-candidates/)

I'm new to this, so please feel free to give me recommendations of how to raise more money for the candidates, and to further give.

https://preview.redd.it/mnd92ygfh3s51.jpg?width=1000&format=pjpg&auto=webp&s=a6201d54848f5baac1a763708a98c2f22d2cbfc6
